message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about we meet in the middle at $137.50?
Thank you for adjusting the price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $135?
I can see you're getting closer to your target, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $138?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $136.
I can see we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $139?
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I believe a fair price for the product would be $137.
I'm not willing to go much lower than that, Bob. I'll meet you at $138, but that's as low as I can go.
Considering the value and quality of the product, I believe $136 would be a fair price. I hope you can agree, Alice.
